member.name: GdiplusStartupInputEx.GdiplusStartupInputEx

summary.para: The constructor sets the GdiplusVersion member to 2. All of the constructor parameters are optional, so you can declare a variable of type GdiplusStartupInputEx without passing any arguments to the constructor, and all of the members will be initialized with appropriate default values.

member.param: See . The default value is GdiplusStartupDefault (0).
Pointer to your DebugEventProc callback function, which GDI+ can call on debug builds for assertions and warnings. The default value is NULL.

Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress the GDI+ background thread. If you pass TRUE, then returns (in its output parameter) a pointer to a hook function, and a pointer to an unhook function. You must call those functions appropriately to replace the background thread. If you don't want to be responsible for calling the hook and unhook functions, then set this member to FALSE. The default value is FALSE.
Boolean value that specifies whether you want GDI+ to suppress external image codecs. The default value is FALSE.

member.name: GdiplusStartupInputEx
member.summary: The GdiplusStartupInputEx structure holds a block of arguments that are required by the function. GdiplusStartupInputEx derives from .

member.name: GdiplusStartupInputEx.StartupParameters
member.summary: See . The default value is GdiplusStartupDefault (0).
